ComicInfo.Summary:
In this graphic novel, Ozkan takes the pin-up to new level as each magnificently rendered illustration produces an episode in a stunning erotic narrative without words, but with explicitly clear meanings.
A lonesome young woman calls a boyfriend over for a night of pleasure. Two other friends stop over for added fun, but wind up falling asleep and experience some highly erotic dream images. Twisted imaginations run the gamut from group sex to water sports.
